# How to Use the Build Summary in DevSecOps Build System to Audit Mobile App Security Projects

Last updated February 19, 2024 by Appdome

When building apps in a team, it can be super helpful to know the current state of the team or what has happened in the team over time. For example, if an unexpected event occurred in your team, you’ll want to know what happened in the team recently that led to this. In addition, you can check your personal activity log to keep track of your latest actions and builds.

This Knowledge Base article outlines how you can view your and your teammate’s activity on the Appdome platform.

We hope you find this knowledge base useful and enjoy using Appdome!

### Prerequisites to Audit Dev-Sec Workflow in Mobile App Security Projects

In order to view your activity log, you’ll need:

* [Appdome Ideal account](https://appdome.com/appdome-pricing/) and [above for teams](/how-to/dev-sec-tools/app-sec-release-automation/use-appdome-go-secure-enterprise-mobile-apps/)
* At least one uploaded/built app on your account/team account

## 5 Easy Steps to Audit Dev-Sec Workflow in Mobile App Security Projects

### Personal Workflow Audit

Follow these step-by-step instructions to view your own activity:

1. Log in to your Appdome account
2. Select your Personal Workspace on the platform
3. View your personal activity log
4. Search for required action(optional):
   * Search by the app name
   * Search by the app bundle ID
   * Search by the app version
   * Search by the app build number
   * Search by the app’s unique [Build ID](/how-to/dev-sec-tools/troubleshooting-secured-apps/use-appdome-build-id-troubleshoot-secured-mobile-apps )
   * Search by the event type, for example, [Build](/how-to/dev-sec-tools/how-appdome-works/how-to-fuse-an-app-end-to-end/), [Context](/how-to/dev-sec-tools/app-sec-release-automation/update-config-files-urls-plist-enterprise-apps/), [Sign](/how-to/dev-sec-tools/how-appdome-works/how-to-sign-my-app-on-appdome/), [Upload](/how-to/dev-sec-tools/how-appdome-works/begin-no-code-mobile-app-security-project/), and [Validation](/how-to/dev-sec-tools/signing-secured-apps/troubleshoot-app-signing-secured-android-ios-apps/)
   * Search by setting a date range
5. Review any changes committed to specific [Fusion Set](/how-to/dev-sec-tools/app-sec-release-automation/build-security-template-android-ios-apps/)

![Personalworkspace.1](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Personalworkspace.1.png)

![Accountactivitylog.2](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Accountactivitylog.2.png)

![Fusionsetsummary.3](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/fusionsetsummary.3-1.png)

### Team Workflow Audit

Follow these step-by-step instructions to audit your team’s Dev-Sec Workflow:

1. Log in to your Appdome account
2. Select the required team on the platform
3. View your team activity log
4. Search for required action(optional):
   * Search by the app name
   * Search by the app bundle ID
   * Search by the app version
   * Search by the app build number
   * Search by the app’s unique [Build ID](/how-to/dev-sec-tools/troubleshooting-secured-apps/use-appdome-build-id-troubleshoot-secured-mobile-apps )
   * Search by the event type, for example: [Build](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/devsecops-automation-mobile-cicd/cyber-release-management/create-mobile-app-protection-templates-for-android-ios-apps-in-devsecops-build-system/), [Context](/how-to/dev-sec-tools/app-sec-release-automation/update-config-files-urls-plist-enterprise-apps/), [Sign](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/devsecops-automation-mobile-cicd/automated-signing-secured-android-ios/automated-app-signing-of-secured-android-ios-apps/), [Upload](/how-to/dev-sec-tools/how-appdome-works/begin-no-code-mobile-app-security-project/), and [Validation](/how-to/dev-sec-tools/signing-secured-apps/troubleshoot-app-signing-secured-android-ios-apps/).
   * Search by setting a date range
   * Search by entering the user mail account
5. Review any changes committed to specific [Fusion Set](/how-to/dev-sec-tools/app-sec-release-automation/build-security-template-android-ios-apps/)

![Teamworkspace.4](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/teamworkspace.4.png)

![Teamactivitylog.5](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/teamactivitylog.5.png)

![Fusionsetdetails.6](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Fusionsetdetails.6-2-1095x731.png)
